title: Lord Hater: The Greatest in the Galaxy
description: Smart men fear him. Ladies want to be near him. Cruising through outer space, with his handsome skeleton face. Lord Hater, the greatest in the galaxy!
quote: The staff of power is so powerful, it can do the impossible: make me even more powerful than I am now.
altHero: Lord Hater, a skelton man running at the camera
alt1: Lord Hater fighting a giant squid
alt3: Lord Hater with a glowing staff
